member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.SemanticLogging.EventListenerExtensions
member.summary: Extension methods to enable and disable events based on names rather than actual instances.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.SemanticLogging.EventListenerExtensions.DisableEvents(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener,System.String)
member.summary: Disables all events for the specified event source.
member.param: The name of the event source to enable events for.
member.remarks: If the event source with the supplied name has already been created the request is processed immediately. Otherwise the request is deferred until the event source is created.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.SemanticLogging.EventListenerExtensions.EnableEvents(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener,System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventLevel)
member.summary: Enables events for the event source with the specified name that have the specified verbosity level or lower.
member.param: The name of the event source to enable events for.
The level of events to enable.
member.returns: if the request was deferred; otherwise, .
member.remarks: If the event source with the supplied name has already been created the request is processed immediately. Otherwise the request is deferred until the event source is created.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.SemanticLogging.EventListenerExtensions.EnableEvents(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener,System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventLevel,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords)
member.summary: Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower, and matching keyword flags.
member.param: The name of the event source to enable events for.
The level of events to enable.
The keyword flags necessary to enable the events.
member.returns: if the request was deferred; otherwise, .
member.remarks: If the event source with the supplied name has already been created the request is processed immediately. Otherwise the request is deferred until the event source is created.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.SemanticLogging.EventListenerExtensions.EnableEvents(System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventListener,System.String,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventLevel,System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventKeywords,System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary: Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower, and matching keyword flags.

The level of events to enable.
The keyword flags necessary to enable the events.
The arguments to be matched to enable the events.
member.returns: if the request was deferred; otherwise, .
member.remarks: If the event source with the supplied name has already been created the request is processed immediately. Otherwise the request is deferred until the event source is created.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.SemanticLogging.Utility.EventEntryExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for .

member.returns: A subscription token to unsubscribe to the event stream.
member.remarks: When using Reactive Extensions (Rx), this is equivalent to doing a Select statement on the to convert it to and then calling Subscribe on it.

member.summary: Subscribes a sink by doing a straight projection of a sequence of and applying a format using a and a instances to convert it to a sequence of entries for that sink.
member.returns: A subscription token to unsubscribe to the event stream.
member.remarks: When using Reactive Extensions (Rx), this is equivalent to doing a Select statement on the to convert it to a and then calling Subscribe on it.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Practices.EnterpriseLibrary.SemanticLogging.Observable.ObservableProjection.CreateSubscription``2(System.IObservable{``0},System.IObserver{``1},System.Func{``0,``1})
member.summary: Creates a subscription to the source, where in every occurrence of the source stream, it transforms the input item using the and pushes the result to the .
member.param: The observer of the output stream.
The conversion delegate to convert from the original type to the destination.
member.typeparam: The type of the original source stream.
The type of the observer and output stream.
member.returns: Returns a subscription token used to unsubscribe to the original source.
member.remarks: This method is behaviorally equivalent to doing the following using Rx: source.Select(selector).Subscribe(observer).
